it appears to be a ROM image.  Generally I think those are highly undistributable.  Try  http://www.google.com/search?q=sp-s2.sp1

gngeo is an emulator for the NeoGeo game console.  It is a processor waiting for instructions.  sp-s2.sp1 contains the instrucstions used to boot the device (and therefore the emulator).  Those isntructions are copyright Nintendo and so cannot be redistributed by Ubuntu.
